code: import React,{useState}from'react';import html2pdf from'html2pdf.js';import'./ReceiptIssuer.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReceiptIssuer(){const[schoolName,setSchoolName]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');const[paymentMethod,setPaymentMethod]=useState('Cash');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[receiptDetails,setReceiptDetails]=useState(null);const
